# robots.txt for Alexis Fiska portfolio
#
# This file instructs crawlers how to index your site.  The sitemap
# URL helps search engines discover all translated pages.

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Point search engines at the automatically generated sitemap.  The
# sitemap is created by the @astrojs/sitemap integration using the
# `site` configuration in astro.config.mjs.  Update the URL if the
# deployment domain changes.
Sitemap: https://alexis-fiska.github.io/sitemap.xml
